dn.autoclosed: Query closed by system because this item was hidden
dn.closedmodified: Data changed after query was closed

close.msg2: Not all data has been submitted. If you exit this page, it will be lost.
close.msg3: A Reason for Change is required. Please try again.

locked.heading: Locked
locked.msg: This form or record is locked and submissions cannot be saved.

validationerror.msg: You must address all errors on this form before it can be marked complete. Please update the value or add a query for each field marked in red.

relevantvalidationerror.msg: Response(s) in some field(s) make this data invalid. This must be corrected to mark the form complete.

autoquery.msg1: Some field values have errors.  These must be addressed before the form is closed.
msg2: Click Cancel to return to the form to manually update the value or add a query for each field marked in red.
Click Proceed to continue closing the form now.  A query will be automatically added for each field marked in red.

complete.msg: Would you like to complete this record and exit?
complete.heading: Confirm Completion

leaveanyway.msg: Would you like to discard the changes and leave anyway?

rfc.heading: Reason for Change
rfc.label: Reason for changes to this record

constraint.relevant: Response(s) in some field(s) make some data on this form invalid. This must be corrected to retain the form's complete status.

gotohidden.msg: The item you are trying to access is currently hidden. Please use the View Query Only icon instead of the View Query Within Record icon to see it.

gotonotfound.msg: The item you are trying to access has been removed from this form. Please use the View Query Only icon instead of the View Query Within Record icon to see it.

loaderror.heading: Hold on a second...
loaderror.msg1: Please contact your support team with the link to this page and the error message below if you need further help.
loaderror.msg1_plural: Please contact your support team with the link to this page and the error messages below if you need further help.
